extension.description: Sports Illustrated Online for XBMC. Sport Illustrated is the premier magazine for Sports. SI.com is a 24/7 sports news website delivers more than 150 original stories to users each week. Coverage includes NFL, MLB, NHL, NBA, College Football, College Basketball, NASCAR, Golf, Boxing, Horse Racing, Soccer and Tennis. SI Now provides new, in-depth interviews and commentary on sports events globally. The Swim Daily provides videos and interviews with the famous SI Swimsuit Issue Models.
